version_description:
We never stop working to make your Textfree experience better. It’s pretty much all we do. For the past couple weeks, we worked to make the app faster and more reliable for you. And gosh darn it, that’s what we’re gonna keep doing.

If you’re enjoying our app, feel free to leave us a review. Good or bad, we love reading them and any feedback helps us make Textfree better for everyone. Thanks.

This one's a biggy! In this update, we're rolling out a new and simplified user interface.

The streamlined navigation makes it easier to get around and gives you a more seamless texting and calling experience. On top of that, many more subtle design tweaks make Textfree Voice easier on the eyes.

If you're enjoying Textfree Voice, consider reviewing our app. We'd love to hear from you.

In this release, our developers have prepared for you an exquisite blend of enhancements. To start, you’ll enjoy a hearty portion of our hand-coded reliability improvements. Next, you’ll experience a sumptuous duo of grass-fed bug fixes served with a side of artisanal stability updates. And finally, a decadent helping of performance upgrades that were handpicked by our team of engineers.

Every couple weeks we roll out updates that make Textfree a better place to chat.

Get the latest version for the best Textfree experience. If you’re enjoying your free phone number, please consider reviewing our app.

Every couple weeks we roll out updates that improve Textfree Voice. Get the latest version for the best experience. If you’re enjoying your free phone number, please consider reviewing our app. Thanks.

Every couple weeks we roll out updates that improve Text Free Voice. Get the latest version for the best experience. If you’re enjoying your free phone number, please consider reviewing our app. Thanks.

We've added full-screen support for the iPhone X. And every couple weeks we roll out updates that improve Text Free Voice. Get the latest version for the best experience. If you’re enjoying your free phone number, please consider reviewing our app. Thanks.

We’re always listening to your feedback to improve Textfree. In addition to regular performance improvements, this release cleans up your voicemail controls so they’re easier to use.  If you’re enjoying the app, consider leaving us a rating or review.

Each Textfree Voice update makes it better, faster, and more reliable. Other noteworthy highlights from this release include:

• Fixed a Voicemail to Text issue that prevented some transcriptions from appearing properly. You can now read your voicemails (and see who recorded it) as expected.

• Improved your conversation view to clearly indicate the specific number of a given contact (Home, Mobile, Work, etc).

• Made some minor design and layout tweaks to keep things tidy throughout the app.

Every couple weeks we roll out updates that make Textfree Voice a better place to talk and chat. Get the latest version for the best Textfree Voice experience.

If you’re enjoying your free phone number, please consider reviewing our app.

• Made some minor design and layout tweaks to keep things tidy throughout the app.

• Fixed an issue when searching for a contact by typing a few numbers, not all the matches in your address book showed up.
On top of regular performance improvements, we fixed an issue that caused deleted voicemail transcriptions to reappear.

Every couple weeks we roll out updates that make Textfree a better place to chat.

This time around, we fixed an issue that prevented media in your device's photo album from being sharable on Textfree.
On top of regular performance updates, we improved how message previews are displayed. You can now see the contact name in your notifications, even when you have the message preview turned off

We never stop working to make your Textfree experience better. It’s pretty much all we do. For the past couple weeks, we worked to make the app faster and more reliable for you.

If you’re enjoying our app, feel free to leave us a review. Good or bad, we love reading them and any feedback helps us make Textfree better for everyone. Thanks.

n addition to regular improvements, we fixed a couple display issues some iPhone X and iPhone 6/7 Plus users were experiencing. These fixes make your picture message and Inbox viewing consistent with other phone sizes.

If you’re enjoying Textfree, please consider reviewing our app.

Every couple weeks we roll out updates that make Textfree a better place to chat. Get the latest version for the best Textfree experience. If you’re enjoying your free phone number, please consider reviewing our app.

Each Textfree update makes your service better, faster, and more reliable. On top of that, this release improves your picture messaging experience by making it easier to share photos instead of prompting you to crop them. If you're enjoying the app, leave us a review or rating. We'd love to hear from you

Better. Faster. More Reliable. That's our motto for every update. And in this release, performance updates and minor bug fixes help make Textfree all of those things.

Get the latest version for the best Textfree experience. If you’re enjoying your free phone number, please consider reviewing our app.

We make regular updates to Textfree Voice to keep everything running smoothly. Get the latest version of Textfree Voice for the best experience.

If you’re enjoying your free phone number, consider leaving us a review or rating. We'd love to hear from you.

You hear a lot about "bugs" in these things. Well, we don't like bugs either. What we do like is making Textfree better. So in this release, we fixed a bug that improved how the new message input field is populated.

We regularly update Textfree to make our service better, faster, and more reliable.

This version is rebuilt with the latest iOS 12 SDK, and fixes an issue that would not dismiss group notification when opening a conversation from notification

You hear a lot about "bugs" in these things. Well, we don't like bugs either. What we do like is making Textfree better.

This release includes the industry standard of limiting app users from adding more than 10 members in a group message.

We regularly update Textfree to make our service better, faster, and more reliable.

This release includes clearer text for notification permission requests

We update Textfree regularly to keep things running smoothly. This release includes our usual blend of performance enhancements, minor bug fixes, and reliability improvements.

This release includes a fix to sort contact list according to native Settings app

You hear a lot about "bugs" in these things. Well, we don't like bugs either. What we do like is making Textfree better.  This release includes a bug fix that new message screen should display the already existing conversation items.

Every couple weeks we roll out updates that make Textfree Voice a better place to chat.

This time around, we fixed an issue that may cause users to receive duplicate system messages.

If you’re enjoying Textfree Voice, consider leaving us a review or rating.

Better. Faster. More reliable. That's what we aim to be, so we've made a few improvements to Textfree Voice.

This release includes the new feature to enable you to view much older messages.

If you like these improvements (and our app in general) leave us a review!

Thanks for using Textfree Voice! To make the app better for you, we make regular improvements to performance and quality.

This release includes a fix to support migration of old empty groups

If you’re enjoying your free phone number, please consider reviewing our app.
Like clockwork, every few weeks we make updates to Textfree Voice to keep things running smoothly. We just made one of these updates and would love to hear what you think of it. Write a review!

We recently made some improvements to Textfree Voice that make more of your communication history accessible. That means your inbox now populates more messages, calls, and voicemails than before.

This release helps fix some of the performance issues and sluggishness associated with your newfound inbox capacity. If you’re enjoying Textfree, please leave us a rating or review.

We want to help you be more productive with Textfree Voice, so we are constantly improving the app. We made more improvements to Textfree Voice that make more of your communication history more accessible.

This release helps fix some of the performance issues and sluggishness associated with your newfound inbox capacity. If you’re enjoying Textfree Voice, please leave us a rating or review
